pullRequest.title: Avoid Redundantly Loading Monitoring Templates on CS Applier Thread
pullRequest.bodyText:
This refactors the loading of monitoring templates slightly so that they aren't loaded over and
over again (from disk) on CS updates. This isn't an important optimization in production for obvious
reasons since it only affects the install stage, but this turned out to cause some slow CS applies
in tests.
Relates #62853

commit.message:
Avoid Redundantly Loading Monitoring Templates on CS Applier Thread

This refactors the loading of monitoring templates slightly so that they aren't loaded over and
over again (from disk) on CS updates. This isn't an important optimization in production for obvious
reasons since it only affects the install stage, but this turned out to cause some slow CS applies
in tests.

Relates #62853

nodes.bodyText: Non master doesn't need to load this in the first place, master only needs to load it once. The current code loads it on every CS update until monitoring templates are fully initialized. In x-pack ITs that spin up 6 nodes this can lead to slowness.
